title: Stuck at Christmas
description: On the second day of Christmas, these two turtle doves are stuck together…As a doctor, my practice is my priority and leaves little time for dating. It's the furthest thing in my mind.Until her.To my surprise, one night is all it takes for me to fall for her, even though I know next to nothing about her.I never thought I'd see my mystery woman again, but like a holiday miracle, she shows up at my clinic one night with her young daughter.Every minute I’m with them only makes me fall harder, but our situation isn’t so simple.Getting stuck in a closet with Isabel just days before Christmas might be the gift we didn’t know we needed.
author: Georgia Coffman
